name: TheAtlantic
text: The anti-MLM movement has been brewing online for years. Now TikTok is the first social-media platform to explicitly ban it, writes @ kait_tiffany. https://t.co/DBMjo2r2V7

name: TheAtlantic
text: BTS, Taylor Swift, Lil Uzi Vert, and more. @skornhaber, Hannah Giorgis, James Parker, and @lenikacruz pick the best albums of 2020: https://t.co/JtdMIdo2jc

name: TheAtlantic
text: In Georgia, progressives could show how Democrats can win suburban voters without Donald Trump on the ballot, @elainejgodfrey writes. https://t.co/VjXrvi5ZxO

name: TheAtlantic
text: “When you find yourself being flattered and asked for your debit-card number in the same breath,” @amandamull writes, “it’s time once again to ponder one of life’s most important questions: What’s the catch?” https://t.co/LzcsC9U3It

name: TheAtlantic
text: What's the best way to reduce the climate change impact of flying? @yayitsrob thinks through the options and examines United's plan in this week's Planet Weekly newsletter. https://t.co/1FVLAuXKDY

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The Texas politician has built his career on using ... defeats to rally support. And losing this lawsuit—his highest-profile setback to date—might have been just what he needed as his own legal problems continue to mount," @CarlosASanchez writes: https://t.co/C1mtDnmTFX

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The empty bowling alleys and movie theaters; the infinity buffet of entertainment and partisan media; the dissolution of a shared American reality—these are distinct yet connected phenomena," @DKThomp writes: https://t.co/D8hrdYGN68

name: TheAtlantic
text: Since the start of the pandemic, Americans have looked to everything from baking projects to jigsaw puzzles to soothe their frayed nerves. Their latest target: Christmas trees, which are selling at a historic clip, writes @amandamull. https://t.co/xWmaY7QGOr

name: TheAtlantic
text: How does a country balance its values and its interests when it shares a border with a powerful autocracy like China? @TMcLaughlin3 spoke to Mongolia's former president to find out: https://t.co/Ae2Ok3GmWk

name: TheAtlantic
text: Facebook has rolled back a post-election algorithm shift that favored authoritative news outlets. “The cycle of harm perpetuated by Facebook’s scale-at-any-cost business model is plain to see,” writes @AdrienneLaF. https://t.co/jO2v3OnscD

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Settling on a show that ran for seven full seasons (or 40) eased decision fatigue and guaranteed at least a few weeks of blissful simplicity." Hannah Giorgis on the appeal of watching 'The Sopranos,' 'Survivor,' and other time-consuming TV shows in 2020: https://t.co/lMDaX0XugA
